title: Lunar revel
body: When is Warring kingdoms Vi gonna be available again?

replies.body: Warring Kingdoms Vi is a legacy skin, so it can make return at some point though I'm not sure when.  Bookmark the [Sales](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales) page should anything come up!  In the meantime, you can still find her through hextech crafting and mystery skins.  Good luck!

Well, tu:( 
Will try to find her un hextech
